title: Loco Motive
description:
On the eve of a landmark speech by the wealthy heiress Lady Unterwald , a straight-laced lawyer, a crime novelist-turned rookie detective, and an undercover spy find themselves embroiled in a murder, a mystery, and worst of all an adventure Now stuck onboard a luxurious steam train, within stabbing distance of a cold-blooded killer, the race is on to prove their innocence once and for all The Devil Within: Satgat
Play as Diana, Arthur and Herman to unwrap the mystery and put your point and click puzzle-solving skills to the test
